languages.text: {n}Мишень разлетается вдребезги. Ваша охрана незамедлительно заходится восторженным ревом, а Соломон почтительно склоняет голову.{/n}
{n}The target shatters. Your guards immediately roar in delight, and Solomorne bows his head respectfully.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мишень разлетается вдребезги. Ваша охрана незамедлительно заходится восторженным ревом, а Соломон почтительно склоняет голову.{/n}

languages.text: {n}的は砕け散った。護衛たちはすぐさま歓声を上げ、ソロモーンは敬意を込めて頭を下げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The target shatters. Your guards immediately roar in delight, and Solomorne bows his head respectfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}的は砕け散った。護衛たちはすぐさま歓声を上げ、ソロモーンは敬意を込めて頭を下げた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hedef paramparça oluyor. Muhafızların sevinçlerini gürültülü bir şekilde ifade ediyor, Solomorne da saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The target shatters. Your guards immediately roar in delight, and Solomorne bows his head respectfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hedef paramparça oluyor. Muhafızların sevinçlerini gürültülü bir şekilde ifade ediyor, Solomorne da saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El objetivo estalla. Tus guardias rugen de alegría y Solomorne inclina la cabeza con respeto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The target shatters. Your guards immediately roar in delight, and Solomorne bows his head respectfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El objetivo estalla. Tus guardias rugen de alegría y Solomorne inclina la cabeza con respeto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}瓶子被打得粉碎，你的护卫兴奋地高呼起来，而索罗蒙恭恭敬敬地低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The target shatters. Your guards immediately roar in delight, and Solomorne bows his head respectfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}瓶子被打得粉碎，你的护卫兴奋地高呼起来，而索罗蒙恭恭敬敬地低下了头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cible se brise en mille morceaux. Vos gardes laissent aussitôt éclater leur joie et Solomorne incline la tête avec respect.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The target shatters. Your guards immediately roar in delight, and Solomorne bows his head respectfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La cible se brise en mille morceaux. Vos gardes laissent aussitôt éclater leur joie et Solomorne incline la tête avec respect.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Ziel zerspringt. Deine Wachen jubeln begeistert und Solomorne senkt respektvoll seinen Kopf.{/n}
